title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Diagnostic Reasoning Instructional Design for Radiological Image Interpretation: Thinking Aloud Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can utilize expert-level purposeful search strategies over 80% when analyzing suspected fracture cases in radiographic imaging.

Learners can explicitly explain four applicable cognitive processes (gestalt interpretation, purposeful search, rule application, prior case reasoning) in diagnostic reasoning via think-aloud protocols.
Learners can analyze error patterns and propose over three corrective strategies during feedback implementation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
